name: Cubie Jump (Tap Dash)
description:
Available on # SIMPLY TAP TO RUN AND JUMP

Run & Jump to adventure with your Cubie & Cupet friends!

From cute looks and immersive gameplay!

Meet those adorable characters - Cubies & Cupets with this free to play arcade.

# HOW TO PLAY
  • Simply tap on the road to jump, tap on the arrow sign to turn.
  • Collect fruit to slow down and dodge holes and obstacles to go further.
  • Use Double Jump wisely to go further !
# GAME FEATURES
  • One-Touch control
  • Infinite maps that change every time you play
  • Enjoy and original low-poly environment & colorful graphics
  • Collect more than 70 Cubies & Cupets with style!
  • Leaderboard support

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at games@unit5soft.com

This game supports 'English', '한국어', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Indonesian', 'Русский', 'Turkish', 'ไทย', 'Tiếng Việt'.
